name: Mycobacteria_Infection_NonTB_ExPulmTestsForMycobacteriumSpeciesInExtrapulmonarySpecimenByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Mycobacteria_Infection_NonTB_ExPulm (Tests for Mycobacterium species in Extrapulmonary Specimen by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with Extrapulmonary Nontuberculous Mycobacteria Infection identified by Culture and Identification Method.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: mycobacterium species (culture or isolate)),(Exclusion Criteria: -complex -respiratory -sputum -bronchoalveolar -bronchial -stool)
